duties_responsibilities.duty: Work primarily in the area of construction accident litigation, defending personal injury, premises liability, and construction accident cases.
Conduct legal research, case management, and assist in the discovery process.
Provide litigation support and assist in legal writing and communication.
Work in an organized, collegial, and growing law firm environment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Paralegal Studies, Legal Studies, or related field (Master's preferred)
